room_title: Escape room "Magic School for Kids" by Room Escape DC in Washington, D.C.
room_description:
During this dynamic and exciting game, participants will learn ancient spells, solve puzzles and help members of the school to save the ancient school of magic from the clutches of the dragon and evil spirits! To do this, team members must unite and work together to collaborate ideas and defeat the dragon!

At the end of the game, each graduate member of the school is awarded a magicianâ€™s diploma.
